title: Machine learning-based prediction of fish acute mortality: Implementation, interpretation, and regulatory relevance

Regulation of chemicals requires knowledge of their toxicological effects on a large number of species, which has traditionally been acquired through in vivo testing. The recent effort to find alternatives...
